thread.title: Field House Named for Douglas Hale; Ground Broken for Facility October 9 (Mercersburg Academy)
thread.title_full: Field House Named for Douglas Hale; Ground Broken for Facility October 9 (Mercersburg Academy) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Field House Named for Douglas Hale; Ground Broken for Facility October 9 (Mercersburg Academy)
text: ( Source : Mercersburg Academy ) On Friday, October 9, Mercersburg will hold a groundbreaking ceremony to mark the official start of construction on the school's first-ever athletic field house, which will be located immediately to the north
